body.name: VOOWO Broom with Dustpan Combo Set, Broom and Dust Pan Set for Home, Kitchen Broom for Sweeping Indoor, Apartment Broom with Dustpan Set, Dust Pan with Long Handle, Tilted Broom with Stand Up Dust pan
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 13 hrs 36 mins
features: 【Heavy Duty Broom With Dustpan Combo Set】Our broom and dustpan set features a high-quality, thickened handle that consists of detachable 0.9-diameter stainless steel poles, ensuring the broom and dust pan is rust-resistant and structurally strong. The handle is securely connected to the broom and dustpan head using the threaded interface, the dust pan and broom set will always remain firmly in place without any looseness or wobbling

【Broom and Dust Pan Set with Long Handle】 Kitchen broom and dustpan set is equipped with an extended four-section handle, with the kitchen broom measuring 51.2 inches and the dust pan with handle measuring 45.7 inches in length. This broom for sweeping indoor allows you to sweep upright without the need to bend over, making household cleaning easy. The handles of the broom and dustpan are freely combinable, allowing you to adjust the height by choosing the number of sections as per your needs

【Apartment Broom for Sweeping Indoor and Outdoor】 The widened broom head is made of high-quality 3-layer bristles, effectively increasing the cleaning area, perfect for sweeping indoor and outdoors with large areas. The broom head tilts at a 45-degree angle with an ergonomic design, allowing for a more natural and comfortable posture during sweeping, reducing stains on your back and shoulders. This apartment household essentials will be one of your best house cleaning products, apartment must haves

【Broom with Stand Up Dustpan for House Cleaning】The stand up dustpan features a curved edge that fits seamlessly with the ground, leaving no dust or debris behind. The built-in comb teeth in the dustpan easily scrape pet hair and human hair from the broom bristles into the dustpan without the need for manual cleaning. this broom and dustpan set is your home essentials

【Compact Standing Broom And Dustpan Set】Our broom and dustpan set for home are equipped with an elastic snap-lock design, allowing you to store the broom and dustpan upright in the gaps of washing machines, refrigerators, cabinets, and other furniture. This design saves space, looks neat, and remains discreet. Suitable for living rooms, kitchens, gardens, offices, and more. this broom and dust pan set can be a practical housewarming gift since it is the home essentials for new home

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tilted Broom with Dust pan Broom with Dustpan Combo Set Broom with Dustpan Combo Set Stainless Steel Broom and Dustpan Set Stainless Steel Broom and Dustpan Set For Indoor & Outdoor Cleaning ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a typical broom but more
reviews.reviewText: While it is a typical brook and gets the job done like any broom, there is a lot more convenience to it. It was super easy to assemble and I love the dustpan because you don’t have to bend on the ground to sweep stuff up. The dustpan also has a clip to hold your broom in place which is also nice for storeage! The bristles on the broom work well and pick up anything and everything

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Checks all the boxes
reviews.reviewText: I really like the broom and dustpan set. It was easy to put together and it’s easy to store. I love this dustpan because it has spared my back so much pain from not having to bend over like I had to do with other dustpans. The broom works fine, and it is easy to keep the bristles clean with the scraper on the dustpan. It’s lightweight, too, which I like. This isn’t commercial use quality, but it’s just fine for home use, and that’s all I needed. This set is a good value at this price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I moved to a house with all wood floors, and my old mangled broom was not cutting it for daily tidying. This broom with dustpan combo is great! I like that I can take out a section of the handles to make it better suited for people of short stature. I didn't realize it has grabby bits on the dustpan, I don't have to grab the hair and fuzz off of the broom anymore! The bristles are longer and softer than my old broom. It's good for daily sweeping but may not work well for someone dealing with mud or lots of dirt/sand. I do wish I could lean the dustpan handle back a bit for a more natural sweep and collection motion. The ability to store the broom nestled into the dustpan provides the perfect compact footprint I desire. I'm pleased as punch with this broom for the price. 5 outta 5 stars recommend this for someone looking for a daily sweeping broom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The set is okay, but not the best. The bristles of the broom are not that stiff, so I don't know how long it will last. I really like how it's designed and how lightweight it is, though, so I hope it lasts a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: While assembling this set, I found that everything felt pretty cheap. From the thin metal tubes to the broom head and dust pan container. After trying out this set, the first thing I noticed is that the bristles are too stiff and not spaced close enough together for efficient sweeping. I do like the built-in comb on the dustpan for removing debris from the broom bristles, but this is pretty standard on this type of dust pan and is not really a standout feature. Being able to assemble the handles to different heights could be handy, but then the set would be tailored to you specifically and may not be the right height for others who may also handle sweeping chores. I ended up sticking with my previous broom/dust pan set which does run about $5 more, but is worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great room
reviews.reviewText: This broom was very easy to put together. You simply screw the rods into each other, and they form a nice tight straight broom. The bristles are short so you can reach underneath cabinets or couches or wherever you may need to sweep. The bristles are nice and strong as well. The dustpan works perfectly. It’s a great height and the broom can be stored inside of the dustpan folded upward, which is a great thing. The best thing about this broom is the dustpan has what I would call teeth on it, that you can scrape the broom up against to pull any additional dirt or hair off of the broom without having to run your hands across the dirty bristles to clean it, I love that about this broom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the dustpan
reviews.reviewText: I love this dustpan. Its a great height and you don't have to bend over. The little ledge really helps collect all the debris. The handle is curved to make it easier to dump which is really nice. The broom holder on the dustpan is really nice as well and holds the broom really well. The broom is absolute rubbish for my needs, the bristles are too soft. I only took off 1 star for that because the dustpan is that nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight but sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: This is surprisingly light, but also sturdy. I felt like the dust pan handle height was a little high for me (I'm only 5'2") so I left out one of the pieces and it was perfect. I like that the dust pan has the comb and a curved design on the bottom. It makes it much easier for me to clean up after my very messy chinchilla who likes to throw hay everywhere for no reason. But mostly, I intend to keep this in my workshop to clean up saw dust and debris. A lot of dust pan/broom combos in this price range are on the smaller side, but this is big enough to pick up off cuts of wood and scrap pieces.
